episodes.title: Viral TikTok Dancers Trapped Inside Cult Controlling their Every Move, Family & Friends Beg for Help
episodes.description:
#7M

Dancers that have been everywhere recently including the Super Bowl, Ellen, countless daytime talk shows, and all over the media are now at the center of a huge controversy that has gripped the dance community.

7M Films manages a group of dancers who have gone viral for their throwback dancing and videos. However, the group is being controlled by a pastor who has a history of fraud.

The Church: https://shekinahchurch.com/

The Management: https://7mfilms.com/
